IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: NURSING HOME CARE FOR THE ELDERLY AND INFIRM, AND SPIRITUAL, VOCATIONAL, AND SOCIAL PROGRAMS.
IRS990.MissionDesc: IT IS THE MISSION OF THE EVANGELICAL HOMES OF MICHIGAN, A HEALTH AND HUMAN SERVICE MINISTRY RELATED TO THE UNITED CHURCH OF CHRIST, TO PROVIDE HEALTH AND HOUSING SERVICES TO PERSONS WHO ARE ELDERLY IN A MANNER WHICH RESPECTS THEIR RIGHTS, DIGNITY AND WORTH AS CHILDREN OF GOD AND TO RENDER THOSE SERVICES WITH COMPASSION AND PATIENCE IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE HIGHEST PROFESSIONAL AND ETHICAL STANDARDS.
IRS990.Desc: NURSING HOME CARE FOR THE ELDERLY AND INFIRM PROVIDED 48,001 PATIENT DAYS. REHABILITATION SERVICES PROVIDED 14,003 PATIENT DAYS THAT ASSISTED SENIORS TO RETURN TO THEIR COMMUNITY. ALSO, THE ORGANIZATION PROVIDES SPIRITUAL, VOCATIONAL AND SOCIAL PROGRAMS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: HOUSING SUPPORT PROGRAMS FOR INDEPENDENT AND ASSISTED LIVING SENIORS PROVIDING 38,537 PATIENT DAYS. PROGRAMS PROVIDE A FOCUS ON SPIRITUAL, VOCATIONAL AND SOCIAL NEEDS OF SENIORS IN THE COMMUNITY.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: OUTPATIENT REHABILITATION SERVICES PROVIDED 1,472 PATIENT ENCOUNTERS THAT ASSISTED SENIORS AND OTHER COMMUNITY MEMBERS TO RETURN TO THEIR COMMUNITY.

Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE A, PART III, LINE 12, EXPLANATION OF OTHER INCOME:

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FOR RESIDENT AND STAFF EDUCATIONAL PURPOSES REGARDING CARE RELATED TO AGING ADULTS WITH AN EMPHASIS ON MEMORY LOSS.

THE CEO'S COMPENSATION AT TIME OF PROMOTION WAS BASED ON MARKET COMPARABLE DATA FROM A CONSULTING COMPANY. A SUB-COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS WITH A BACKGROUND IN HUMAN RESOURCES USED THIS DATA TO ASSIST THE GOVERNING BODY IN THE DETERMINATION OF COMPENSATION. THE PROCESS WAS CONDUCTED IN 2020.

TaxExemptBondsIssuesGrp.PurposeDesc: REFUNDING OF MSF SERIES 2008 BONDS AND NEW MONEY COMPONENT

IssuerName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: THE ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT CORPORATION OF THE CITY OF SALINE (MICHIGAN)

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE EXECUTIVES AND THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS PRIOR TO FILING. THE 990 IS SENT ELECTRONICALLY TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS PRIOR TO THE BOARD MEETING FOR REVIEW AND THEN DISCUSSED AT THE MEETING, IF NECESSARY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS GO THROUGH AN ORIENTATION PROCESS TO ADVISE THEM ON FIDUCIARY RESPONSIBILITIES AND COMPLIANCE ISSUES. ANNUALLY, A CONFLICT OF INTEREST QUESTIONNAIRE IS COMPLETED BY THE BOARD. FURTHER, THE BOARD GOES THROUGH EMPLOYEE ORIENTATION AND PERIODIC TRAINING REGARDING THE "CORPORATE COMPLIANCE" POLICY. ALL FORMS ARE REVIEWED BY THE COMPLIANCE OFFICE AND ANY CONFLICTS ARE IDENTIFIED AND RESOLVED. THE RESOLUTION OF AN INDEPENDENCE ISSUE CAN RANGE FROM REMOVAL FROM VOTING TO TERMINATION OF THE RELATIONSHIP DEPENDING UPON FACTS AND CIRCUMSTANCES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE CEO'S COMPENSATION AT TIME OF PROMOTION WAS BASED ON MARKET COMPARABLE DATA FROM A CONSULTING COMPANY. A SUB-COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS WITH A BACKGROUND IN HUMAN RESOURCES USED THIS DATA TO ASSIST THE GOVERNING BODY IN THE DETERMINATION OF COMPENSATION. THE PROCESS WAS CONDUCTED IN 2020.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
THE PRIOR PERIOD ADJUSTMENT OF $2,207,419 REPRESENTS THE EMPLOYEE RETENTION CREDIT RECEIVABLE FOR APPLICABLE QUARTERS IN FISCAL YEAR ENDED APRIL 30, 2021.

DisregardedEntityName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: SHARED SERVICES HOME HEALTH CARE CORPORATION
